author: Advances in Electrical and Electronic Engineering
title: Reward
content:
Dear Respected Reviewers, Authors, and Readers of the Advances in Electrical and Electronic Engineering (AEEE) Journal,
Thank you for your continued support of the journal. To show our appreciation for your contributions, we are pleased to announce a reward program as follows:

All published papers that receive at least 10 citations will be eligible for an APC waiver voucher for one accepted manuscript.
The citation count will begin as soon as the paper is accepted and will continue until June 30th of the second year following the year of acceptance (n+2). For example, if a paper is accepted in 2024, citations will be counted until June 30th, 2026.
Only citations from the Scopus or Web of Science databases will be counted.
The APC waiver voucher is valid for 9 months from the date of issuance and/or when it is sent by email.
The voucher is non-transferable, cannot be redeemed for cash, and can only be used for an accepted paper in the AEEE journal.
The voucher can be used by any of the authors of the cited paper but is valid for one-time use only. It cannot be transferred to anyone who is not an author of the accepted paper.
The program applies to all papers accepted after March 15th, 2024, until further notice.
We hope this reward program serves as a token of our appreciation for your valuable contributions to the journal.

Best regards,
The AEEE Editorial Team
